title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 712-1.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 712-1.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Subpart sets forth minimum construction and
physical environment standards applicable to general hospitals built and to
portions of general hospitals altered or renovated pursuant to department or
commissioner approval granted prior to October 14, 1998 and to general hospital
construction projects not requiring such approvals that were completed prior to

October 14, 1998. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
712-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
